mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sr.ID, sr.ROLE_CODE, sr.PARENT_ID, sr.ORDER_NO, sr.ROLE_NAME, sr.MEMO FROM sys_role sr, sys_user_role ur, sys_user su WHERE sr.ID = ur.ROLE_ID AND ur.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT u.ID FROM sys_role r, sys_user_role ur, sys_user u WHERE r.ID = ur.ROLE_ID AND ur.USER_ID = u.ID AND r.PARENT_ID in
#{parendId}

SELECT sm.ID, sm.ICON, sm.URL, sm.NAME, sm.ORDER_NO, sm.PARENT_ID FROM sys_user su, sys_user_role ur, sys_role sr, sys_role_function rm, sys_function sm WHERE su.ID = ur.USER_ID AND ur.ROLE_ID = sr.ID AND sr.ID = rm.ROLE_ID AND rm.MENU_ID = sm.ID
AND su.ID = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT rm.OPERATION FROM sys_user su, sys_user_role ur, sys_role sr, sys_role_function rm WHERE su.ID = ur.USER_ID AND ur.ROLE_ID = sr.ID AND sr.ID = rm.ROLE_ID AND rm.OPERATION is not null AND su.ID = #{userId}

SELECT su.ID, su.USER_NAME, su.REAL_NAME, su.HEAD_IMG_URL, su.EMAIL, su.TEL_NO, sr.ROLE_NAME, sd.NAME AS DEPT_NAME FROM sys_user su, sys_user_role ur, sys_role sr, sys_depart sd WHERE su.ID = ur.USER_ID AND ur.ROLE_ID = sr.ID AND sr.ID = ur.ROLE_ID AND su.DEPT_ID = sd.ID AND su.ID = #{userId}
